sentences: SBSTA Chair Thorgeirsson announced that Margaret Martin (Canada) and Kishan Kumarsingh (Trinidad and Tobago), were elected as EGTT Chair and Vice-Chair, for 2004.
TUNISIA presented the Djerba Declaration on Tourism and Climate Change, which, inter alia, calls for the IPCC to include tourism in its Fourth Assessment Report.
enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
